DOC.brief_summary: This multi-centre , randomised , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-arm dietary intervention study . In total , 800 men woman risk Metabolic Syndrome ( MS ) recruit . Subjects eligible study present two four MS diagnostic criterion , least one : - fast triglyceride ≥150 mg/dL ≤400 mg/dL OR - HDL-cholesterol ≤50 mg/mL woman , ≤ 40mg/mL men ( fast triglyceride ≥110 mg/dL ) . Each four recruiting centre recruit 200 volunteer . Participants randomly assign one four group receive either : - Dairy BEF + egg placebo + bakery placebo - Egg BEF + dairy placebo + bakery placebo - Bakery BEF + dairy placebo + egg placebo - Dairy , egg bakery placebo Participants require consume three allocated product day 12 week . Eligible volunteer include randomly allocate one four group . At baseline , 6 week 12 week inclusion , participant visit recruit centre clinical biochemical investigation . At 3 week 9 week participant complete questionnaire relate satisfaction food product , compliance consumption study food product , gastrointestinal side effect health-related adverse event occur previous 3 week . At recruit centre 40 participant require take part additional activity , : stool sample collection , adipose tissue aspiration , body composition analysis dual energy x-ray absorptiometry ( DEXA ) assessment physical activity .
DOC.brief_title: Pivotal Assessment Effects Bioactive Health Wellbeing . From Human Genome Food Industry
DOC.criteria: subject present two four diagnostic criterion metabolic syndrome , least one elevate fast triglyceride OR HDLcholesterol ≤50 mg/mL woman , ≤ 40mg/mL men ( fast triglyceride ≥110 mg/dL ) . subject five clinical criterion metabolic syndrome Regular drug therapy impact serum lipid ; Diabetes ( fast glucose > 1.26 g/L , antidiabetic treatment ) ; Celiac disease , lactose intolerance , allergy milk egg protein ; Antibiotic treatment within last 3 month ; Recent history cancer cancer treatment ( less 2 year ) ; Active recently diagnose intestinal malabsorption ; Diagnosis organ failure Familial dyslipidemia ( TG ≥ 4.5 mmol/l 400 mg/dl ) ; Illegal drug use chronic alcoholism smoking ; Intensive physical exercise ( ≥ 5 hour/week ) ; Consumption nutritional supplement contain DHA , BG AC ; History allergy intolerance component use BEF ; Women pregnant lactating ;
